main.name: Alan Fidelino
main.occupation: Web developer aspiring to land a full-time web development job focused on building User Interface design with ReactJS and Redux.
main.description: I am primarily a front-end web developer specialising in ReactJS and a full stack web developer with working knowledge in using the Ruby on Rails framework
main.bio: I am an avid learner of technology and have dedicated the last 5 years studying and sharpening my skills and knowledge in web development technologies and languages. With the availability of MOOCs (Massive Open Online Courses), learning has become a passion for me to improve myself and be challenged to always be on my toes to start each day fresh with new challenges.

education.degree: Full Stack Web Development Specialising in Ruby on Rails
education.description: Six-month Web Development course designed to for beginners to have the skills to be an employable junior front-end and Ruby on Rails developer. The curriculum covers HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Ruby, and Rails. By the end of the program, students will have built their first web app and will understand developer tools like Git and Heroku. The end project for this course is an online portfolio and an e-commerce web-application utilising Rails5 technology and Stripe as payment system.
This project based course entailed coding 4 Node applications with varying complexities utilising MongoDB, Authentication, Socket.io, automated testing and version control

The course takes aspiring web developers into a plethora of web development topics like HTML, CSS, Javascript for both front end and back end, version control, No SQL databases, authenticaion, authorisation to prepare for a potential career in Web development. The online course entails tests, code challenges and sample web application as capstone project.

work.title: Communications Specialist - Front and Full Stack Web Developer
work.description: I am a fulltime Communications Specialist with skills in digital media, graphic design and was tasked to develop our intranet site. I single handedly designed, developed and maintained the group IT website using the Ruby on Rails framework.

work.title: Media Specialist/Online Specialist
work.description: My role entailed providing detailed analysis of businesses being serviced by the top account executives in White Pages in order to match the digital and print solutions offered by the company to the client's business needs in terms of digital presence. Other roles include digital project management, online coaching and sharing of new trends in web technologies that helped the team in their digital knowledge.

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Alan in Woolworths. Alan is an exceptionally hard working professional. His ability to work under pressure and deliver a top class outcome is what makes him stand out from the crowd. He is an excellent communicator and has the ability to translate complex information in simple and exciting formats. Alan is a keen learner and is passionate about digital technology. He keeps reinventing himself by learning new skills and finding ways to use that in his role. I believe Alan's passion in the web/mobile development space holds him in good stead in this fast moving world. He will be a great asset to any organisation especially in the digital space.
testimonials.user: Ani Nair - Senior Manager, Customer Experience Design ICare, Alan's previous boss, mentor and influencer

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Alan while he was my colleague at Woolworths. During this time he was diligently learning two programming languages, Javascript and Ruby. Not only did he learn two development stacks but he would also find practical ways to implement what he had learnt to benefit the business. The crowning project was one in which he built the portal for Woolworths I.T. division. I respect Alan as he would go over and above his role consistently, finding new problems he could solve and helping others, finding best practice resolutions to whatever problem he was faced with. I would highly recommend Alan as a problem solver, team player and technologist.
testimonials.user: Trent Shields - Founder and Lead Strategist at Dev Haus X, Alan's Web Development Mentor
